      static AtomFilterStatic ACCEPT_ALL
      Static instance of a filter that accepts all atoms.

    • Field Detail

      • ACCEPT_ALL

        public static final AtomFilterStatic ACCEPT_ALL
        Static instance of a filter that accepts all atoms. Returns true for null atom also.

      • ACCEPT_NONE

        public static final AtomFilterStatic ACCEPT_NONE
        Static instance of a filter that rejects all atoms. Returns false for null atom also.
